data.meanings: to be smitten by sunbeams, suffer from the heat of the sun, become uncovered, be revealed, appear conspicuously.Can also means those hours of the morning which follow shortly after sunrise, full brightness of the sun, sunshine, part of the forenoon when the sun is already high, bright part pf the day when the sun shines fully, early afternoon, high noon, daytime/daylight.
data.sentence: The word وَالضُّحَى comes from the root ض ح و and is associated with the meanings: to be smitten by sunbeams, suffer from the heat of the sun, become uncovered, be revealed, appear conspicuously.Can also means those hours of the morning which follow shortly after sunrise, full brightness of the sun, sunshine, part of the forenoon when the sun is already high, bright part pf the day when the sun shines fully, early afternoon, high noon, daytime/daylight.
